Translations.Text: DI PLACX believers pledged allegiance VI ARB. Li kon ki est their kor consequently Li ben them contentment rekompenc them immediate victory
Additionally ili gajn many spoils DI est Almighty SAGX
DI PROMES VI many spoils KE VI GAJN. Li do advanced kelk benefits vi en this life Li withheld popol man aggression vi rendered this sign believers! Li tiel direkt vi rekt path
As por grup vi possibly ne defeat DI sorb zorg da them; DI est Omnipotent
disbelievers ever batal vi ili turn around flee! Ili ne hav Lord Mastr; ili ne hav helper
Such est di sistem throughout histori, vi trov di sistem est unchangeable
Li est Unu withheld their man aggression vi withheld your man aggression them en val Mecca post Li granted vi victory over them! DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do

est ili disbelieved barred vi el Sankt Masjid ecx prevent your offerings reaching their destination! tie kred hom women enemy camp vi ne kon vi est pri al dolor them unknowingly! DI TIEL admits His mercy whomever LI VOL. Ili persist Li requite those them disbelieve painful retribution

While those disbelieved enraged their kor filled pride tag ignorance DI ben His messenger believers peaceful contentment directed them uphold vort righteousness! This est ki ili nu ind DI est fully aware da all AJX
